Competitive Strengths Established track record and strong reputation •	A strong reputation built over 23 years for consistent delivery of quality products and services and reliable integrated solutions •	Customers include LTA, PUB, HDB, URA, BCA, PowerGas, SingTel, Changi Airport Group, Penta Ocean Construction, Hyundai Engineering & Construction One-stop services and integrated solutions •	Unique in Singapore and the region, able to leverage on existing scalable, low cost integrated business model for improved competitiveness and overseas expansion •	Greater cost savings accruing to customers arising from integrated services Enhanced operational synergies and cost efficiencies •	One of three asphalt premix plant operators in Singapore* which enabled us to produce asphalt premixes for own use to enjoy cost-savings and operational efficiencies and for sales to third parties for additional revenue stream •	Own construction waste recycling plant enable us to reclaim and recycle construction wastes into backfilling materials and recycled aggregates for use at work sites and asphalt premix production which reduces disposal costs and dependency on aggregates as backfilling materials * As at October 2013 Highly experienced management team with complementary skills •	Extensive network of customers and business contacts of which we have good working relationships to support the Group •	In-depth industry knowledge enables anticipation of market changes and customers’ needs Comprehensive services backed by advanced technology and equipment •	Greater value-add to customers through use of latest technologies and advanced equipment •	Better operational efficiency, productivity, quality control and cost savings Multiple awards and accreditations •	BCA’s L6 contractor in the categories of cable/pipe laying and road reinstatement, able to tender for Singapore public sector contracts of unlimited value •	BCA’s A2 contractor in the category of civil engineering, able to tender for Singapore public sector contracts of up to $85 million •	Ranked 9th among Enterprise 50 (E50) Awards 2010 •	Winner of Singapore Corporate Awards (SCA) 2013 for Best
